full_description:
Anker 323 PowerCore PIQ 10000mAh Type-C Power Bank

The Anker 323 PowerCore PIQ 10000mAh Power Bank is a compact and portable power bank that can keep your devices charged on the go. With a 10,000mAh capacity, it can charge most smartphones multiple times and even tablets once or twice. It has two USB ports, so you can charge two devices simultaneously. The USB-C port supports two-way fast charging, so you can charge your devices up to four times faster than with a standard charger. The Type-C Power Bank can charge your devices even faster than with two-way fast charging. The Anker 323 PowerCore PIQ 10000mAh Power Bank is a great option for anyone who needs a portable and powerful power bank to keep their devices charged on the go. It is especially well-suited for people who travel frequently or who use their smartphones for heavy tasks such as gaming or streaming video. This power bank can charge your iPad mini 5 up to 1.3 times and your iPhone 14 twice thanks to its 10,000 mAh capacity. For extra convenience, the USB-C connector allows two-way fast charging. This power bank offers dependable protection while charging your gadgets thanks to its temperature control, high-density polymer cell, smart circuit, and fireproof enclosure. For people who frequently carry around multiple devices, this power bank is ideal, as it can simultaneously charge two devices at a maximum power of 12 watts.

The Anker PowerCore Metro Slim 10000mAh Power Bank is small and powerful. One of the slimmest and lightest portable chargers with a capacity of 10000 mAh on the market. Provides 2.6 full charges for the iPhone XS, 2.4 full charges for the Galaxy S10, and 1.3 full charges for the iPad Mini 5. Anker's unique PowerIQ and VoltageBoost technologies work together to provide the quickest charge for any device, while the trickle-charging mode is ideal for charging low-power devices. Anker's MultiProtect is an 11-point safety system that protects you and your gadgets. The Anker PowerCore Metro Slim 10000mAh Power Bank has a capacity of 10000mAh. PowerCore Slim 10000 is luxury on the inside and out, with a sleek fabric and matte surface with a cool-blue LED light to indicate battery status.

Astonishing Size

The PowerCore Slim 10000 is exceptionally thin and light for its high capacity. It can charge a phone up to three times and most tablets once. Weighing barely half a pound, it's only slightly heavier than a baseball and is intended to fit easily in your palm or pocket; ideal for work or travel.

Advanced Charging Technology

Anker's proprietary PowerIQ and VoltageBoost technologies work together to provide the quickest possible charging up to 2.4 A. Qualcomm Quick Charge is not supported.

Trickle-charging Mode

Trickle charging is available on the Anker PowerCore Metro Slim 10000mAh Power Bank. Trickle charging is intended to charge low-power devices such as headphones, Bluetooth speakers, and other accessories more efficiently. To turn it on, press the power button twice or hold it for 2 seconds until the LED indicator becomes green. The Anker PowerCore Metro Slim 10000mAh Power Bank comes with an 18months warranty.

The Anker PowerCore Speed 10000mAh Power Bank is a Compact Super-High-Capacity Portable Power bank. PowerCore Speed 10000 QC combines 3 distinct fast-charging technologies to ensure that any and all devices are charged in the shortest time possible. If high temperatures are detected then it automatically modifies power output to reduce heat.
